attributes.action: That what is now the National Anthem be made the Royal Anthem,
attributes.additional_details:
That "God Save the Queen" become a Royal Anthem.to be sung when Her Majesty or her close representatives are in attendance, and that the British National Anthem should be chosen by the people.
My choice would be "Land of Hope and Glory,"
This would allow those who pay allegiance to HM to sing the Royal Anthem rather than the British/English Anthem, ie. Australia. Canada. actually all Commonwealth countries
